prodNameC: 常盈人體生長激素檢驗試劑
ingredientsDesc: Anti-hGH [I-125] Reagent:One bottle, 22 mL, containing <10 μCi (370 kBq) [I-125]-labeled anti-hGH antibody in a protein-based (BSA) buffer with sodium azide as a preservative.DSL-1900 (500 Tubes) contains five bottles of reagent.Anti-hGH-Coated Tubes:One hundred (100) plastic tubes with anti-hGH immunoglobulin immobilized to the inside wall of each tube. DSL-1900 (500 Tubes) contains 500 tubes:hGH Controls:Two vials, Levels I and II, containing low and high concentrations of hGH in human serum with a non-mercury preservative.DSL-1900 (500 Tubes) contains three sets of Controls.Wash Concentrate B:One bottle, 60 mL, containing buffered saline with a nonionic detergent. Dilute 25-fold with deionized water prior to use . DSL-1900 (500 Tubes) contains five bottles of Wash Concentrate.

hGH standards:Seven vials, labeled A-G, containing concentrations of approximately:WHO 80/505 Calibration: 0.0, 0.2, 1.2, 2.6, 8.0, 22.0 and 40.0 ng/mL hGH or WHO 88/624 Calibration: 0.0, 0.13, 0.8, 1.7, 5.8, 15.0 and 30.0 ng/mL hGH. The hGH Standards are prepared in human serum with a non-mercury preservative.DSL-1900 (500 Tubes) contains three sets of Standards.Anti-hGH [I-125] Reagent:One bottle, 22 mL, containing <10 μCi (370 kBq) [I-125]-labeled anti-hGH antibody in a protein-based (BSA) buffer with sodium azide as a preservative.DSL-1900 (500 Tubes) contains five bottles of reagent.
applicantName: 常盈實業股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 台北市北投區永興路一段49號
efficacy: 利用放射性免疫定量方法檢測血清中的生長激素荷爾蒙。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: A 臨床化學及臨床毒理學
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: A.1370 人體生長激素試驗系統
